I thought we were on the threads discussed. What am I missing?

From:Christine Moyer

Subject:Re: OFW
Message 976 of 4024
Ok, no worries. Let’s resolve here then
Sent:02/02/2024 at 05:30 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/02/2024 at 05:32 PM)
Subject:Re: Gorgeous Day: Dad & AD
Message 977 of 4024
Nothing. It’s all good. I just can’t tell when you are going to drop off till the next day. That’s all.
I’m not trying to poke you. I’m just trying to make sure I don’t make the same mistake. I did last night.
Sent:02/02/2024 at 05:31 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/02/2024 at 05:32 PM)
Subject:Re: OFW
Message 978 of 4024
So... As I mentioned, I think it’s unfair to have this conversation without setting the context first.
I have not been able to talk to anyone and have basically been shut out while fear and anxiety has only increased from the cameras to Xfinity and then
to AT&T. And I am begging not educate you.
Then yesterday Elsa weighed in with her side of the story, but she has never even heard from me. So I don’t know how she has commentary on my
side of the story if I’ve never even talked to her.
Not only that, but I never even got to hear what A.D. even said so I can speak to it. That said it turns out that he saw exactly what I saw, but I’ve not
had an opportunity to tell him that and explain.
Then, of course, nobody knows that’I have apologized to you and acknowledged that the cameras were there. And Indefinitely caught an earful for
not saying “I’m sorry” when I already had weeks ago.
So as I have me mentioned and offered several times today I would like to show you everything. I would like to do that as soon as possible. Right now,
we do not have a full accounting of the story.
Can you please work with me on at least that part? It will go a long way. And I don’t think it hurts us to tell Dr. Brown that we actually looked at this
rather than ignored all of the explanation.
Sent:02/02/2024 at 05:40 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/02/2024 at 05:56 PM)
Subject:Re: Gorgeous Day: Dad & AD
